name: Animal Affinity
text: You are skilled at working with animals and mounts.
benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Handle Animal and Ride skill checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, the bonus increases to +4 for that skill.
mythicText: You have a greater affinity with wild animals, and can speak with them.
mythicBenefit: The bonus on Handle Animal and Ride skill checks from Animal Affinity increases by 2. In addition, you can expend one use of mythic power to speak with animals as the spell. Your caster level for this effect is equal to twice your tier.
text_zh: 你对于与动物以及坐骑的工作颇有心得。
benefit_zh: 在驯养动物和骑乘技能检定上获得+2奖励。如果某技能受训等级10以上，对于该技能检定的奖励为+4。
